content.svp: Enable interaction and engagement between patients and caregivers for effective chronic disease management
content.parent_description: Chronic disease management includes managing specialized care programs, gaining real-time insights into a patient's well-being, and enabling interaction between patients and caregivers to improve health outcomes.
description: Manage specialized care programs for clinical scenarios, such as diabetes, pregnancy, post-surgery care, and more.
Encourage behavioral changes and improved adherence to treatment plans and medications.
Gain access to real-time insights of patientsâ€™ well-being for immediate or ongoing responses.
Draw important conclusions that provide for better patient outcomes and improved lives.

Chronic Disease Management.description: Chronic disease management includes managing specialized care programs, gaining real-time insights into a patient's well-being, and enabling interaction between patients and caregivers to improve health outcomes.

content.svp: Improve self-managed care with a health engagement foundation
content.parent_description: Self Managed Care includes linking patients with doctors and caregivers so they can interact remotely to improve self-managed care and adherence to treatment plans and medications.
description: Provide immediate responses by enabling patients to remotely interact with doctors and caregivers.
Improve adherence to treatment plans and medication with engagement solutions.
Process patient-centric health scenarios with flexibly built extensions.

Self Managed Care.description: Self Managed Care includes linking patients with doctors and caregivers so they can interact remotely to improve self-managed care and adherence to treatment plans and medications.

content.svp: Help patients make more-informed choices about their care through high-quality information sharing, proactive outreach, and education
content.parent_description: Patient education involves proactively approaching patients and supporting them so they can learn about their health status and improve their well-being.
description: Educate patients about their disease state, health risks, and actively engage them in improving their health.
Include clinicians in education and engagement to personalize relevant content and increase overall patient involvement and satisfaction.
Drive patient visits through patient segmentation using approved patient and third-party data.
Use tracking, marketing, and sales performance evaluation tools to measure the conversion of leads to new patients for elective care and services.

Patient Education.description: Patient education involves proactively approaching patients and supporting them so they can learn about their health status and improve their well-being.
